question.title: GetLine 2
question.content:
You are given with a string that is in email format. Here, you have to take input of a string till the '@' character.

Examples :

Input: s = hello_world@xyz.com
Output: hello_world
Input: s = geeksforgeeks@gfg.com
Output: geeksforgeeks

rephrased.body: Given an email address string, extract the username portion (the part before the '@' symbol).
